contents: Mr. Atkins agrees to work from his home office. (17) <u>He is responsible for maintenance of his home computer, printer, and other equipment. The company is responsible for providing necessary supplies.</u> For out-of-pocket expenses to be reimbursed, the company must approve the expenses prior to purchase. Mr. Atkins has received information from the IT department regarding minimum system (18) <u>requirements maintenance routines, and backup procedures.</u> He will connect to the company’s server according to company protocols and install company software on his home computer. Mr. Atkins will log in to the company’s phone system daily to receive work-related phone calls and messages.
